channel.title: Template on Joshua Graves
channel.description: Recent content in Template on Joshua Graves

item.title: Manager's Guide to Your First One-on-One
item.description: First time meeting someone you’re managing? Here’s how to set things up for success.

item.title: Ethnographic Interviews
item.description: Why interviewing people in their environment is crucial. Includes a guide for conducting them.

item.title: Journey Map
item.description: An exercise to understand the person’s journey through a service.

item.title: Quick Start Guide
item.description: A quick checklist to make sure designers have what they need to get going at the start of a project.

item.title: User Interviews & Tests
item.description: Why we observe users in their environment, the benefits, and a script for getting started.

item.title: User Recruiting Script
item.description: A script that you can send to people you want to interview for your research.

item.title: User Research Plan
item.description: A guide for planning your research that will convince your stakeholders that the time investment is worth it.
